19  package org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.system.extern;
20  
21  //JDK imports
22  import org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.structs.Job;
23  import org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.structs.JobInput;
24  import org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.structs.JobInstance;
25  import org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.structs.exceptions.JobException;
26  import org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.structs.exceptions.JobInputException;
27  import org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.util.GenericResourceManagerObjectFactory;
28  import org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.util.XmlRpcStructFactory;
29  import org.apache.xmlrpc.WebServer;
30  
31  import java.util.Date;
32  import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
33  import java.util.Map;
34  import java.util.Vector;
35  import java.util.logging.Level;
36  import java.util.logging.Logger;
37  
38  //OODT imports
39  //APACHE imports
40  
41  /**
42   * @author woollard
43   * @version $Revision$
44   *
45   * <p>
46   * An XML RPC-based Batch Submission System.
47   * </p>
48   *
49   */
50  public class XmlRpcBatchStub {
51  
52      /* the port to run the XML RPC web server on, default is 2000 */
53      private int webServerPort = 2000;
54  
55      /* our xml rpc web server */
56      private WebServer webServer = null;
57  
58      /* our log stream */
59      private static Logger LOG = Logger.getLogger(XmlRpcBatchStub.class
60          .getName());
61  
62      private Map jobThreadMap = null;
63  
64      public XmlRpcBatchStub(int port) {
65          webServerPort = port;
66  
67          // start up the web server
68          webServer = new WebServer(webServerPort);
69          webServer.addHandler("batchstub", this);
70          webServer.start();
71  
72          jobThreadMap = new ConcurrentHashMap();
73  
74          LOG.log(Level.INFO, "XmlRpc Batch Stub started by "
75                              + System.getProperty("user.name", "unknown"));
76      }
77  
78      public boolean isAlive() {
79          return true;
80      }
81  
82      public boolean executeJob(Map jobHash, Map jobInput)
83          throws JobException {
84          return genericExecuteJob(jobHash, jobInput);
85      }
86  
87      public boolean executeJob(Map jobHash, Date jobInput)
88          throws JobException {
89          return genericExecuteJob(jobHash, jobInput);
90      }
91  
92      public boolean executeJob(Map jobHash, double jobInput)
93          throws JobException {
94          return genericExecuteJob(jobHash, jobInput);
95      }
96  
97      public boolean executeJob(Map jobHash, int jobInput)
98          throws JobException {
99          return genericExecuteJob(jobHash, jobInput);
100     }
101 
102     public boolean executeJob(Map jobHash, boolean jobInput)
103         throws JobException {
104         return genericExecuteJob(jobHash, jobInput);
105     }
106 
107     public boolean executeJob(Map jobHash, Vector jobInput)
108         throws JobException {
109         return genericExecuteJob(jobHash, jobInput);
110     }
111 
112     public boolean executeJob(Map jobHash, byte[] jobInput)
113         throws JobException {
114         return genericExecuteJob(jobHash, jobInput);
115     }
116 
117     public synchronized boolean killJob(Map jobHash) {
118         Job job = XmlRpcStructFactory.getJobFromXmlRpc(jobHash);
119         Thread jobThread = (Thread) jobThreadMap.get(job.getId());
120         if (jobThread == null) {
121             LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Job: [" + job.getId()
122                                    + "] not managed by this batch stub");
123             return false;
124         }
125 
126         // okay, so interrupt it, which should cause it to stop
127         jobThread.interrupt();
128         return true;
129     }
130 
131     private boolean genericExecuteJob(Map jobHash, Object jobInput) {
132         JobInstance exec = null;
133         JobInput in = null;
134         try {
135             Job job = XmlRpcStructFactory.getJobFromXmlRpc(jobHash);
136 
137             LOG.log(Level.INFO, "stub attempting to execute class: ["
138                                 + job.getJobInstanceClassName() + "]");
139 
140             exec = GenericResourceManagerObjectFactory
141                 .getJobInstanceFromClassName(job.getJobInstanceClassName());
142             in = GenericResourceManagerObjectFactory
143                 .getJobInputFromClassName(job.getJobInputClassName());
144 
145             // load the input obj
146             in.read(jobInput);
147 
148             // create threaded job
149             // so that it can be interrupted
150             RunnableJob runner = new RunnableJob(exec, in);
151             Thread threadRunner = new Thread(runner);
152             /* save this job thread in a map so we can kill it later */
153             jobThreadMap.put(job.getId(), threadRunner);
154             threadRunner.start();
155 
156             try {
157                 threadRunner.join();
158             } catch (InterruptedException e) {
159                 LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Current job: [" + job.getName()
160                                     + "]: killed: exiting gracefully");
161                 synchronized (jobThreadMap) {
162                     Thread endThread = (Thread) jobThreadMap.get(job.getId());
163                     if (endThread != null) {
164                         endThread = null;
165                     }
166                 }
167                 return false;
168             }
169 
170             synchronized (jobThreadMap) {
171                 Thread endThread = (Thread) jobThreadMap.get(job.getId());
172                 if (endThread != null) {
173                     endThread = null;
174                 }
175             }
176 
177             return runner.wasSuccessful();
178         } catch (Exception e) {
179             LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, e.getMessage());
180             return false;
181         }
182     }
183 
184     public static void main(String[] args)  {
185         int portNum = -1;
186         String usage = "XmlRpcBatchStub --portNum <port number for xml rpc service>\n";
187 
188         for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
189             if (args[i].equals("--portNum")) {
190                 portNum = Integer.parseInt(args[++i]);
191             }
192         }
193 
194         if (portNum == -1) {
195             System.err.println(usage);
196             System.exit(1);
197         }
198 
199         XmlRpcBatchStub stub = new XmlRpcBatchStub(portNum);
200 
201         for (;;) {
202             try {
203                 Thread.currentThread().join();
204             } catch (InterruptedException ignore) {
205             }
206         }
207     }
208 
209     private class RunnableJob implements Runnable {
210 
211         private JobInput in;
212 
213         private JobInstance job;
214 
215         private boolean successful;
216 
217         public RunnableJob(JobInstance job, JobInput in) {
218             this.job = job;
219             this.in = in;
220             this.successful = false;
221         }
222 
223         /*
224          * (non-Javadoc)
225          * 
226          * @see java.lang.Runnable#run()
227          */
228         public void run() {
229             try {
230                 this.successful = job.execute(in);
231             } catch (JobInputException e) {
232                 LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, e.getMessage());
233                 this.successful = false;
234             }
235 
236         }
237 
238         public boolean wasSuccessful() {
239             return this.successful;
240         }
241     }
242 }
